Package com.resistance.theresistance.logic

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Application
    Handles logic regarding the application that isn't related to a specific game room.
    Game
    Game class where players will be able to join a game by entering the "keyword" associated with game object.
    GameController
    GameController class is in charge of controlling the Game.
    Host
    Host class in charge of the Game's players before the game has actually started.
    Leader
    Class is responsible for letting the Leader choose Missionaries.
    Mission
    Mission class is in charge of all things mission related.
    Missionary
    Class is responsible for giving Missionaries the ability to vote on Missions.
    Player
    Player class is responsible for creating the Player object, and letting Players vote
    Round
    Round class is in charge of storing each Round of Mission.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    Game.State
    Defines the states that a game can be in
    Player.PlayerType
    Describes the player type, spy or resistor
  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
    Game.IllegalGameException
    Illegal Game Exception - throws an exception when the preconditions
